column5: We're headed up to Beteau July 28th for the first time and was wondering if anyone who has been up there in past few weeks would mind posting a report. I heard the mosquitos are really thick this year. The water was crazy high in the early season, I'm wondering where the levels are tnow and how far you can travel on river without getting too shallow. Thanks.
The only person that could answer those questions is Eddie. Give him a call or email him. Conditions on that river can change daily, let alone weekly.
